message.body: Howdy. My weekend was alright. DJed Fri and Sat night, went dancing after on Fri, then did a 20 mile bike ride yesterday afternoon before working a dog f
Yeah, my weekend was pretty uninteresting too. Do yo uhave anything planned for the 4th of July weekend?
Working a Subaru event on the 4th at a Festival with Fireworks so I'll get to watch those. On the 3rd i'm attending a country concert with fireworks after
(1/2)Sounds interesting. I'm going to a science exhibition which is about the technology behind fireworks: how they work and emit different colors and designs.
(2/2)It's an adults only party with an open bar. Perfect for geeks like me :P
